Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: C. Biddle Jan.ry 25. 1799. Joseph Ball Esq.

dear Sir Gen.t Williams has a large Wooden building house on his Plantation in the State of N. York and wishes to be inform'd on what terms he can have it insured. and what is necessary for him to have before he can get it insured, will you be so good as to inform me. Yr most Obed. Serv. Charles Biddle Jan.ry 25. '99 1@17 or according to Description
